name: Wikipedia Tools
description: Wikipedia lookups including search, page summaries, specific sections, and images. Great for factual information and definitions.

tools.description: Search Wikipedia for pages matching a query
tools.use_when: User wants to find Wikipedia pages about a topic but doesn't know the exact title
tools.not_for: Getting actual content (use get_wikipedia_summary after finding the title)

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search term to look for (e.g., 'Artificial Intelligence')

tools.returns: Dictionary with list of matching page titles
example_queries: Find wiki pages about machine learning

tools.description: Get the full summary of a Wikipedia page
tools.use_when: User wants to learn about a topic, get a definition, or understand what something is
tools.not_for: Specific sections (use get_wikipedia_section), finding page titles (use search_wikipedia first)

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The exact title of the Wikipedia page

tools.returns: Dictionary with title, summary text, and URL

tools.description: Get content of a specific section from a Wikipedia page
tools.use_when: User wants a specific section like 'History', 'Applications', or 'Controversy' from a Wikipedia page
tools.not_for: Full page summary (use get_wikipedia_summary), finding pages (use search_wikipedia)

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The exact title of the Wikipedia page

tools.returns: Dictionary with title, section name, and section content
example_queries: Get the history section of the AI Wikipedia page
What are the applications of machine learning?
Show me the controversy section for Bitcoin

tools.description: Get all image URLs from a Wikipedia page
tools.use_when: User wants images or pictures from a Wikipedia page

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The exact title of the Wikipedia page

tools.returns: Dictionary with title and list of image URLs
example_queries: Get images from the Mars Wikipedia page
Show me pictures of the Eiffel Tower from Wikipedia
